name: Omega Automation Engine
shortDescription: AI-powered automation engine that turns your workflows into sellable products fast.
longDescription:
Omega Automation Engine is your done-for-you automation system starter kit.

You get pre-built workflows, plug-and-play SOPs, and a clear structure for turning what you already know into a sellable automation offer.

Use it to:
• Launch your first automation service quickly
• Standardize your delivery with battle-tested templates
• Show clients something real instead of talking in theory

Everything is built to be simple, fast, and practical. No fluff. Just what you need to start charging for automation work.

testimonials.quote: Saved me 20+ hours of setup. Worth every penny.
testimonials.author: Sarah K.

testimonials.quote: Finally shipped my first automation service in a weekend.
testimonials.author: Marcus T.

testimonials.quote: The templates alone are worth 10x the price.
testimonials.author: Priya M.

faqs.a: Everything is delivered as editable files: JSON for workflows, Google Docs/Notion for SOPs, and spreadsheets for calculators. Import directly into Levqor or adapt for any platform.

faqs.q: Do I need a Levqor subscription?
faqs.a: No. The templates work standalone. However, they're optimized for Levqor's workflow builder—import with one click if you're a user.
Yes. 30-day no-questions-asked refund. If it doesn't help you ship faster, get your money back.

faqs.q: How do I access the files?
faqs.a: Instant download after purchase. You'll receive a .zip file and a link to the Notion dashboard.
